examples.example: 在与人交往中，恰当的称呼能瞬间拉近彼此的距离。

translate.english: In interpersonal communication, an appropriate title can instantly shorten the distance between each other.

examples.example: 我们应该尊重他人，礼貌地使用恰当的称呼。

translate.english: We should respect others and use appropriate titles politely.

examples.example: 每次见面时，我们都亲切地使用合适的称呼来打招呼。

translate.english: Every time we meet, we affectionately use appropriate greetings to say hello.
